description:
LEAN COFFEE: Project Management and Agile, with Rui Martins and Romeu Mattos from Farfetch 
This LEAN COFFEE will focus on Project Management and Agile, as an iterative approach to project management.  
Lean Coffee is a structured, but agenda-less meeting. Participants gather, build an agenda, and begin talking. Conversations are directed and productive because the agenda for the meeting was democratically generated.The format for a Lean Coffee is very simple. This is intentional. It is meant to be the least structure necessary for a coherent and productive meeting. No more, no less.
name: LEAN COFFEE: Project Management and Agile
